title: NASA’s Rocket Engine Fireplace
content:
Oh, this is so good: NASA has an 8-hour cozy fireplace video in 4K thatâ€™s actually a rocket engine (in a fireplace).

This glowing mood-setter is brought to you by the SLS (Space Launch System) rocket that launched Artemis I on its mission around the Moon and back on Nov. 16, 2022. 8.8 million pounds of total thrust â€“ and a couple glasses of eggnog â€“ might just be enough to make your holidays merry.
